name: At the Break of Dawn
description:
Wanting to break free from her usual routine, Miranda found herself trying to branch out by checking out some of the local bars. After several failed attempts at hitting it off with anyone, she stumbles across a mysterious girl with dark hair. After nearly a month of admiring her from afar, she finally get the opportunity she never thought she would get: to spend the night with her unrequited crush. Although maybe her feelings aren't as unrequited as they feel.

A short Kinetic Novel made for the YuriJam2017.  

Most of the backgrounds you see were created by Uncle Mugen and can be found here
